text.value: You should try your best to comfort your child. In addition, I want to add that it is very important to look into the child's eyes, hold them gently, and speak to them all the time. Help the women to demonstrate again using the new techniques.

You have tried your best to distract the child from an unwanted behavior. In addition, I want to add that it is always good to draw/shift your child's attention to something positive. This is better for child development than scolding or hitting them. If a child does a good behavior, praise them so that they continue to do the good behavior. Help the women to demonstrate again using the new techniques.
ADVISE FOR CONCERN: Ask the caregiver to copy the child's movements, to follow the child's lead.

I want to discuss with you ways to correct the child when they are acting/doing an unwanted behavior. For example, maybe the child is trying to take a very hot cup of chai. This is bad, because the child might spill the cup and get burnt. Can you show me how you would correct the child in this situation?
Have you observed the caregiver comforting the child?
Have you observed the caregiver correcting the child?
Distracts child from unwanted actions with appropriate toy or activity.
Scolds child or responds harshly to child.
How did the caregiver correct the child?
Does not move with child, or controls child's movements or is not responsive to child.
Moves toward and with child, and talks to or makes sounds with child, responds to child.
During the visit, how does the caregiver interact and respond to the child's movements, activities or sounds?
For the following questions, observe interaction between caregiver and child if possible. If have not observed so far during visit, ask caregiver to demonstrate.

I can see that you do a very good job comforting the child and showing them love. You are very good at this. For example, it is very important to look into the child's eyes, hold them gently, and speak to them all the time.

I can see that you do a very good job distracting your child from unwanted behaviors. It is always good to draw/shift your child's attention to something positive. This is better for child development than scolding or hitting them. If a child does a good behavior, praise them so that they continue to do the good behavior.
Care for child development (CCD): Caregiver and Child Behavior
What age matches/compares with the development of the child?

The child's age is months. Normal behaviors for children are: 3 to 6 months: Responds to sound Looks and and follows object with eyes Interested in faces Starts to reach for objects 6 months up to 9 months: Smiles back when you smile at child Alerts caregiver when hungry Coos, makes noises to communicate Sits up on own Recognizes and responds to caregivers and colors 9 months up to 12 months: Begins to babble and form first words Responds to caregivers verbally and physically Crawls Stands on own Walking on own or with assistance 12 months up to 2 years: Walking on own Talks, by 2 years old begins to make very short sentences Begins to form questions Eats on own Sleep throughout the night 2 years or older: Expresses desires, needs, questions, etc. forming full thoughts in sentence form and curious about world around them.

Are there any other family members or caregivers who could join us for a discussion about your child's development? In particular, encourage father to join if available. Welcome them to join the discussion. Also ask the mother to have her child join or be nearby.

Communicating well with your baby/child is important to support a strong connection and healthy development. By talking to our children and telling them the names of things they recognise words and this helps them learn to talk.

Playing is important for children. A child who has no opportunities to play will not develop healthily. Children learn by seeing what others do, copying and practicing new things. Play is a great way to help children learn and practice new skills! For example, when they shake a rattle they learn what sound it makes, they learn to move the rattle.
Does not talk to child or talks harshly to child
Looks into child's eyes and talks softly to child, asks questions
Tries to force smile or is not responsive to child

Can you show me how you talk to your child? Can you show me some of the things you to do when you want to make them smile?
Indicate how caregiver talks to child:

How do you play with your child?
Indicate whether caregiver plays with child, e.g. with toy objects or word games, or other, appropriate for age.

That's great, communicating like this with your child supports healthy development. By talking to our children and telling them the names of things they recognise words and this helps them learn to talk.

PRAISE the way caregiver demonstrated playing with the child for their healthy development. Children learn by seeing what others do, copying and practicing new things. Play is a great way to help children learn and practice new skills! The more opportunities we give our children to play, the more information is given to their brain. For example, when they shake a rattle they learn what sound it makes, they learn to move the rattle. It also helps them physically. Let the child show you how they want to play, rather than forcing them to play a certain way.
Respond to your child's sounds and interests. Call the child's name, and see your child respond.
Good ways to communicate with your child at this age are to:
Ask your child simple questions. Respond to your child's attempts to talk. Show and talk about nature, pictures, and things.

Encourage your child to talk and answer your child's questions. Teach your child stories, songs and games. Talk about pictures or books. Children will learn words if you draw something then repeat the word. ADVISE the caregiver that they can draw their own child-friendly picture books, they don't need to buy in the shop. Example toy: book with pictures, material to draw on, ball, swing, bicycle.
Tell your child the names of things and people. Show your child how to say things with hands, like 'bye bye.' Sample toy: doll.
Playing is important to support healthy development. At this age, good ways to play with your child are to:
Help your child count, name and compare things. Make simple toys for your child. Sample toys: Objects of different colors and shapes to sort, sticks.
Give your child clean, safe household things to handle, bang, and drop. Sample toys: containers with lids, metal pot and spoon.
Hide a child's favorite toy under a cloth or box. See if the child can find it. Play peek-a-boo.
Give your child things to stack up, and to put into containers and take out. Sample toys: Nesting and stacking objects, container and clothes clips.

Good ways to communicate with your child at this age are: (demonstrate) Smile and laugh with your child. Talk to your child. Get a conversation going by copying your child's sounds or gestures. PRACTICE: Ask caregiver to make large gestures and cooing sounds; copy baby's sounds and gestures to try to elicit smile, and see baby's responses.

ADVISE for CONCERN: Caregiver should try to communicate more with baby. A baby and young child begin to understand many words before they can speak, but if we do not talk to our babies they will not learn new words. Children communicate with us from a young age, even before learning to speak they tell us what they need and they know when we are happy or sad.

Playing is important to support healthy development. A baby who has no opportunities to play, and practice new skills will not develop healthily. We need to ensure our babies have lots of opportunities to play, practice new skills, see new things and copy what others do. For example, when they shake a rattle they learn what sound it makes, they learn to move the rattle. Suggest one play that a caregiver can try with the child and instruct them how they can play it with a child. Then emphasize how the child enjoys playing with a caregiver.

At this age, good ways to play with your child are to: (demonstrate) Provide ways for your child to see, hear, feel, move freely, and touch you. Slowly move colorful things for your child to see and reach for. (Sample toys: shaker rattle, big ring on a string) At this age, children have the tendency of putting everything they get into their mouths. Caregivers should not discourage them from doing this as the mouth is the most sensitive organ at this age which the children use to sense taste, softness, hardness. It is a way of learning. Just make sure that you provide clean and safe items to the child, and that they are medium or large size so the child will not choke.
Looks into baby's eyes and talks softly to baby
Tries to force smile or is not responsive to baby
Responds to baby's sounds and gestures to get baby to smile

Can you show me how you talk to your baby and how you try to get your baby to smile?
Indicate how caregiver interacts with baby
Gets the child's attention with a shaker toy or other object
Moves the baby's arms and legs or gently strokes the child

Can you show me how you play with your baby? Please demonstrate for me. What do you think your child is learning while they play?
Indicate how the mother interacts with the baby:

PRAISE caregiver for communicating well with baby. Children communicate with us from a young age, even before learning to speak they tell us what they need and they know when we are happy or sad. By talking to our children and telling them the names of things they recognise words and this helps them learn to talk. Repetition is a very good strategy for a child learning.

PRAISE mother for playing well with baby. ADVISE: Babies learn by playing and trying things out, and by observing and copying what others do. For example, when they shake a rattle they learn what sound it makes, they learn to move the rattle.
Who does the child usually spend time with?

I'd like to talk with you about your child's behavior and development and observe how you interact together. This is an important time in their life because the way they will grow and learn, it depends very much on behaviors that you show to your child.
I want to ask you some questions about how your child is learning and also discuss how you can play and communicate with your child to help them best grow and learn.
Welcome caregivers and family members and encourage them to join the discussion.
Care for child development (CCD): Assess Development and Coach on Play and Communication
Is the child having cold or low temperature?
Has the child recently had any convulsions?
The child has a danger sign. Advise the mother to go to any nearby health facility within the next 24 hours so a doctor can look at the child and help.
Is the child having difficulty or fast breathing (Two counts of 60 breaths or more in one minute)?
Is the child able to drink or breastfeed?
Is the child able to eat and drink?
Is the child able to breastfeed?
Does the child have fever or high temperature ?
Is the child lethargic or unconscious?
Does the child have skin boils ?
No danger signs were identified in your child, but if the child develops any of the signs we discussed, you should go the health facility immediately.

I'd like to discuss disposal of children's feces with you. A child's stool can be dangerous and can cause diseases.
Where does your child defecate? Where do you dispose your child feces?
Do you have a latrine in your household?
Using latrines can help prevent the spread of disease. If possible, you should have a latrine in your home.

Explain to the mother the dangers of child stool and safe disposal: The safest way to dispose of a child's feces is to help the child use a toilet or latrine or, for very young children, to put or rinse their feces into a toilet or latrine. There is evidence that children's feces could be riskier than adults' feces. Children's feces should be treated with the same concern as adult feces, using safe disposal methods that ensure separation from human contact and household contamination.

Habari mama? Kama tulivyozungumza wakati wa matembeleo yetu yaliyopita kuwa ntakuja kukutembelea kwa ajili ya kujua maendeleo na afya ya mtoto/watoto, na pia kujadiliana na wewe pamoja na familia juu ya malezi na makuzi bora ya mtoto/watoto wako. Nafahamu kuwa unajua jinsi ya kumtunza mtoto wako na kumkuza vizuri, lakini hii ni kama nyongeza tu ya elimu kutokana na ongezeko la maradhi na matatizo mbali mbali yanayoweza kudhoofisha afya na makuzi bora ya mtoto.
Name: Age: years, months, days Contact person: House number: Kitongoji:

SAY: I'd like to enroll into infant and child services. I'll do a first check-up on their health today, and them return at important times as they grow up to make sure they are healthy and well. Is that OK?
Greet the family and invite others to join the conversation as appropriate.
Do you or the caregiver have any concerns that child is not responding or seems slow?
I want to ask you some other specific questions about your child's development.

Having a child who is slow to learn can be stressful. A child with delays in development may require more help with feeding and with learning new things. Extra time spent in helping a slow to learn child with feeding and with playing and communicating can a child develop new abilities.
Thank you for talking about this issues with me today. I noticed a concern that I would advise you see a doctor for. I am going to refer you to the nearest health facility so you can ask them about this concern.
Refer family for hearing and vision screen if necessary.
Compared with other children of the same age, does your child appear in any way mentally backward, dull or slow?
Can your child name at least one object (for example, an animal, a toy, a cup, a spoon)?
Does your child learn to do things like other children his/her age?
Compared with other children, does or did your child any serious delay in sitting, standing or walking?
Does your child have difficulty hearing? (Uses hearing aid, hears with difficulty, completely deaf)
Compared with other children, does your child have difficulty seeing, either in the daytime or at night?
Does your child have difficulty in walking or moving his/her arms, or does he/she have weakness, and/or stiffness in the arms or legs?
Does your child speak at all (can he/she make him or herself understood in words; can say any recognizable words)?
Does your child sometimes have fits, becomes rigid, or lose consciousness?
Is your child's speech in any way different from normal (not clear enough to be understood by people other than the immediate family)?
When you tell your child to do something, does he/she seem to understand what you are saying?
Care for child development (CCD): Child Development Concerns

How is the baby being kept warm? Praise the family if the baby is kept well wrapped and close to the mother, and is bathed with warm water and dried and wrapped immediately. If not, try to solve any problems. Refer to page 10 of Bango Kitita for more information.
What positions are you using? How frequently do you breastfeed? How long will the baby feed at one time? LISTEN: Allow mother to explain her experience breastfeeding soon after birth.

I'd like to talk to you more about breastfeeding.
ASK: have you ever breastfed?
Educate the mother about the importance of exclusive breastfeeding in the first 6 months and the importance of frequently breastfeeding the child. Please refer to page number 13 of bango kitita.
Praise the family if the baby is getting only breast milk.
How is it going? Do you have any concerns you wish to discuss? Discuss concerns with mother.
Discuss with the mother why she is not frequently and exclusively breastfeeding. Advise her and problem solve with her.

CHUNGUZA: kama kuna uwezekano muombe mama amnyonyeshe mtoto wake na chunguza, ikiwa hakuna uwezekano muulize mama maswali kuliko kumchunguza. Osha mikono yako. CHUNGUZA Je mama anayenyonyesha anaelewa hili ? Je umegundua kuna tatizo lolote kwenye kunyonyesha? Toa muongozo kwa kile ulichokiona. Jaribu kutatua tatizo lolote uliloliona au alilolisema mama.
How long after birth did the mother first put the child to the breast?
Educate the mother about the proper positioning and attachment of the baby during breastfeeding. Refer to page numbers 16 and 17 of Bango Kitita.
Is the positioning and attachment ok? This means the chin is touching the breast, mouth wide open, lower lip turned outward, more areola visible above than below the mouth.

Help the mother to: Sit or lie comfortably. Support the baby's whole body, not just the neck and shoulders. Ensure baby's head and body are in a straight line. Have the baby face the breast. The baby's nose is opposite her nipple. Hold the breast and touch the baby's cheek with the nipple, so baby turns and opens mouth. Fix the baby's mouth on the nipple. Make sure baby is in a comfortable position to feed. Touch the baby's lips with her nipple.
Congratulate mother for breastfeeding in a right position.

Help the mother to improve positioning and attachment. If baby is too sleepy to feed, try to wake him by rubbing body, arms, or legs. If baby is still not feeding from the breast after one hour, squeeze the first, yellow fluid from the breast into a clean cup or spoon. Feed this to baby often and in small amounts, making sure baby can swallow it. Wait until the baby's mouth is opened wide Move the baby quickly onto her breast, aiming the infant's lower lip well below the nipple. If breast engorgement, express a small amount of breast milk before starting breastfeeding to soften nipple area so that it is easier for the baby to attach.
Praise the mother and advise her to continue doing the same.

Hygiene is very important during complimentary feeding, advise this to the mother: Good hygiene is important to avoid diarrhea Use a clean spoon or cup to give foods or liquids to your baby. Wash your hands with soap and running water frequently.
Hygiene is very important during complimentary feeding, advise this to the mother: Good hygiene is important to avoid diarrhea. Wash your hands with soap and running water frequently.

Let's talk about food Hygiene: Good hygiene is important to avoid diarrhea. Use a clean spoon or cup to give foods or liquids to your baby. Wash your hands with soap and running water frequently, especially before feeding your children.
If your baby is no longer being breastfed, please ensure that they are receiving a healthy, nutritious diet.
Are you still breastfeeding your baby?
Continue breastfeeding your baby on demand both day and night. This will maintain health and strength as breast milk continues to be the most important part of your baby's diet.

Try to cook a variety of food for the baby: Each week you can add one new food to your child's diet. Feed your baby complementary foods 2 times a day. Give 2 to 3 tastes at each feed. Breastmilk should be your baby's main food at this age. Continue to breastfeed on demand. Drinking plain, clean water is a good habit to the baby's health. Use a separate plate to feed the baby.

Your baby's umbilical cord stump dries out and eventually falls off - usually within one to two weeks after birth. In the meantime, treat the area gently: Keep the stump dry._Expose the stump to air to help dry out the base. Keep the front of your baby's diaper folded down to avoid covering the stump. DO NOT apply any substance to the cord._ It may be dangerous to your baby to apply any substances to his or her cord. Stick with sponge baths._While there's no harm in getting the stump wet, sponge baths might make it easier to keep the stump dry. Let the stump fall off on its own._Resist the temptation to pull off the stump yourself.

[Days 0-7:]
<span style="display:block;padding-left:1em">Talk and sing to the baby <span style="display:block;padding-left:1em">Provide ways for your baby to see, hear, move arms and legs freely, and touch you <span style="display:block;padding-left:1em">Smile at your baby <span style="display:block;padding-left:1em">Touch and hold the infant with love

[Days 8 to month 6]: PLAY: Provide ways for your child to see, hear, feel, move freely, and touch you. Slowly move colourful things for your child to see and reach for. Sample toys: shaker rattle, big ring on a string. COMMUNICATE: Smile and laugh with your child. Talk to your child. Get a conversation going by copying your child's sounds or gestures.

You and your partner/ husband or family members are responsible for the infant's brain and mind development, and these early months and years should be used for his/her growth.
A newborn baby can see things, feel things, and can respond to the voices and sounds she or he hears. A baby can tell us she or he is hungry or unhappy by the sounds he makes. A baby loves to see faces of her or his mum and dad (or other important caregiver). [see translation in EFFECTS job aids]
The more opportunities we give our babies to explore the world (by playing, practicing new skills, seeing new things and copying what others do), the more information is given to the brain.

You've declined to consent for to receive community health services. He/She won't receive any more visits from me.

Encourage the parent to take to the facility as soon as possible to receive care. Let them know that you'll return after 3 days to confirm that they were able to receive the proper care at the facility.

It is very important to wash your hands with soap and water before touching a baby.
Newborns can get an infection more easily than an adult or an older childInfection in a newborn can be dangerous because child immunity is still weak/not fully developed. Frequent and correct hand washing is one of the most effective ways to prevent infections.
Discuss materials needed to wash hands: We need clean flowing water and soap. If water and soap is not available, hands can be cleaned with ash instead.

The most important moments to wash hands are: After defecation After cleaning a child's bottom Before feeding a child Before eating food Before preparing food After handling raw meat, fish, or poultry

If your baby cries for more than 3 hours or if you are worried about how he looks or feels, go to the health facility immediately. Serious bad reactions very rare, but can happen occasionally as with any medicine.

After getting a vaccine, there is a small chance your baby may get a fever, rash, or a sore arm or leg where the vaccine was given. Give your child plenty of breastmilk. Usually this is mild and not a problem. If it doesn't go away quickly or if you have any concerns, go to the health facility and follow the advice they give you.

is the baby excessively crying or restlessness for more than one hour, non-stop?

If you haven't already, and if you've been providing pregnancy services to 's mother , you should conduct the postpartum visit with her as soon as you finish the infant/child visit.
Many people may face challenges when it comes to playing and communicating with their child to stimulate child development. I want to talk to you about some common challenges parents face.
During the visit, did you have any concerns that child is being treated harshly?
Are you concerned that you have to leave the child with someone else for periods of time?
Is the family environment stressful with a lot of arguments?
Are you concerned that not having toys is a problem?
On how many days in the past week was the child left in the care of another child, that is, someone less than 10 years old, for more than an hour?

Sometimes adults taking care of children have to leave the house to go shopping, wash clothes, or for other reasons and have to leave young children.
On how many days in the past week was the child left alone for more than an hour?
Named, counted, or drew things for the child
Read books or looked at picture books
Sang to or with the child, including lullabies
Took the child outside the home
Cannot select "None of the above" and another option.
In the past three days, did the mother or any household member age 15 or over engage in any of the following activities with the child?
Are you concerned about feeling too stressed or burdened to play and communicate with your child?
Are you concerned about feeling that you don't have enough time to play and communicate?

Select 1 play and 1 communication activity from the Play and Communication Guide in the age range of the child. Show the parents the picture and explain the activity. Let caregivers try the activity. Observe the interaction and help caregivers be sensitive and responsive to child's cues. Aim to help the caregiver and child have a successful two-way interaction with caregiver observing, listening and responding to child. If child is not able to do the activity choose from younger age range or suggest ways to make the play simpler. If child is at end of age range and can easily, suggest ways to help the child learn something new or choose activity from next older age range. Encourage the caregiver to continue to engage in play and communication activities daily.
How many children's books or picture books or cards do you have in your home? _This can be any written material with pictures_
Does the child play with homemade toys, such as dolls, cars, or other toys made at home?
Does the child play with household objects such as bowls or pots, or objects found outside, such as sticks, rocks, animal shells or leaves?
Does the child play with toys from a shop or manufactured toys?
Now let's practice some new play and communication activities. These activities will help your child learn through seeing, hearing, touching, moving thinking or feeling.

If you have concerns that child is not safe due to harsh or physical discipline, refer immediately to the Shehia Women and Children Coordinator or Sheha, who will help you contact the correct authorities or individual. You can also refer to the nearby police station or one stop centre.

Harsh child discipline will not support healthy development. Correcting and teaching the child in a positive manner is more effectivePraise the child for good behavior. Give the child choices about what to do, instead of saying "don't".

Needing to leave children with others is also a common challenge that mothers and caregivers face. Identify at least one person (over 10 years old) who can care for the child regularly and give the child love and attention. This individual should be advised on how to appropriately care for the child. One challenge if you want your child to get used to another caregiver, is maybe the child doesn't want to leave your side. It only wants to be with you all the time. If you leave your child may cry. This is also very common. But over time, gradually, they can become accustomed to a new person. You just need to give them some time. Don't be afraid. Encourage the mother and father to spend time with the child when possible

Listen to the caregivers feeling and help them identify a key person who can share their feelings and help them with their child. Encourage the caregiver and other family members to support each other in playing and communicating with the child. Build their confidence by demonstrating their ability to carry out a simple activity.
Children take their cues from parents. Try to control your own stress and anger: Keep children out of the argument. Reassure your children that the argument is not their fault and that you love them.

Finding enough time is a common problem that many mothers and caregivers face. One strategy you may try, is to play with the child any time you are with them. For example, if you're cooking dinner and the child is with you, you can try to take a short moment to play with your child a little bit.
Another common challenge is that the you might not get enough help from other members of your family. I suggest, that you speak with other family members to tell them that you are feeling overwhelmed by all the work you are doing at home and taking care of the baby. You can try to encourage people in your family/household to take time to play with the baby.

Actually, almost anything can be a toy. You don't need to spend lots of money. You can use any household objects that are clean and safe. You can even use a little bit of fabric/kitambaa in order to make a little toy. Just make sure it is clean and safe. Now, I would like to help you think about what toys we can make just with the materials around us right now. Demonstrate how the caregiver can use local materials to make toys for the child. Show examples appropriate to the child's age. If the children are older, encourage the caregiver to develop no/low cost toys with their children. Play with child. The child will learn by playing with the caregivers and other people.
Who engages in these activities with the child?
How many total hours did you or any household member over 15 spend playing with the child in the last three days?
Care for child development (CCD): Problem Solving

Explain the following regarding the importance of breastfeeding a small baby at least every 2-3 hours: Breast milk is the best food for a small baby as it protects the baby against infections A small baby needs to be fed more often because they can only take very small amounts of breast milk at a time If a baby is sleeping for longer than 2 hours, wake the baby up by smooth touch on soles such as palms and foot soles to breastfeed, even during the night

Start the discussion by explaining/defining a "small" baby: A small baby is a baby who is born with less than 2 kg and is considered to be of low birth weight A very low birth weight baby weighs less than 1.5 kg at birth

I'd like to talk to you more about breastfeeding.
Have you ever breastfed?
Praise the family if the baby is getting only breast milk.

Let's practice the proper attachment of the baby during breastfeeding. Could you please show me how you attach the baby? Help the mother to improve attachment: Ask her to touch the baby's lips with her nipple, wait until the baby's mouth is opening wide, and move the baby quickly onto her breast, aiming his lower lip below the nipple. Ask the mother to show you how to position the baby during breast feeding.
Discuss with the mother why she is not frequently and exclusively breastfeeding. Advise her and problem solve with her.

Small babies may have more health issues than other babies. It is important to look for danger signs, keep them warm, and feed them often to keep them healthy. We are going to learn the issues small babies may face and how we can take care of them.
Is the child being fed anything other than breast milk?
Hongera sana,maziwa ya mama yana virutubisho vya kutosha na chakula kamili kwa mwanao. Endelea kumnyonyesha mwanao maziwa ya mama tu kwa muda wa miezi 6 bila ya kumpa kitu kingine chochote.
it is not good to give your child who is younger than 6 months anything other than breast milk.
How long after birth did the mother first put the child to the breast?
How often do you breastfeed your baby, including night and day time?

Your baby's umbilical cord stump dries out and eventually falls off - usually within one to two weeks after birth. In the meantime, treat the area gently:
<span style="display:block;padding-left:1em">Keep the stump dry._Expose the stump to air to help dry out the base. Keep the front of your baby's diaper folded down to avoid covering the stump. <span style="display:block;padding-left:1em">DO NOT apply any substance to the cord._ It may be dangerous to your baby to apply any substances to his or her cord. <span style="display:block;padding-left:1em">Stick with sponge baths._While there's no harm in getting the stump wet, sponge baths might make it easier to keep the stump dry <span style="display:block;padding-left:1em">Let the stump fall off on its own._Resist the temptation to pull off the stump yourself

Advise the mother on maintaining good hygiene, including washing her hands often with soap and water. Explain that preventing infections is even more important for the small baby than the normal baby as the small baby is more prone to infections.

Kangaroo Mother Care is a method of care for small babies in order to keep the baby warm. The method involves infants being carried with skin-to-skin contact.
Emphasize that anyone can do KMC.

Review the following steps in placing the baby skin-to-skin, and observe the mother as she practices KMC:
<span style="display:block;padding-left:1em">Undress the baby except for a nappy, hat and socks. <span style="display:block;padding-left:1em">Place the baby upright between the caregiver's breasts or chest with the baby's chest. <span style="display:block;padding-left:1em">Put the legs of the baby along the mother's ribs and turn his or her head to one side. <span style="display:block;padding-left:1em">Secure the baby with a special blouse or cloth tied around the mother and the baby. <span style="display:block;padding-left:1em">The mother can then wear a shirt, sweater or shawl if she wants. <span style="display:block;padding-left:1em">Ask the mother to breastfeed the baby as often as the baby wants but at least every 2 hours. <span style="display:block;padding-left:1em">It is very important that the baby receives the skin to skin contact for 20 hours every day

Do you know why small babies need to stay extra warm in the first days of life?
<span style="display:block;padding-left:1em">Small babies have less fat than larger babies, so low body temperature can be a major issue. Make sure your baby is dry and warm all the time. <span style="display:block;padding-left:1em">Kangaroo mother care (KMC) is an excellent way for mothers to keep these babies warm at all times. The skin-to-skin contact of KMC helps keep the baby's body temperature normal.

SAY: You and your partner/ husband or family members are responsible for the infant's brain and mind development, and these early months and years should be used for his/her growth.
A newborn baby can see things, feel things, and can respond to the voices and sounds she or he hears. A baby can tell us she or he is hungry or unhappy by the sounds he makes. A baby loves to see faces of her or his mum and dad (or other important caregiver). [see translation in EFFECTS job aids]
The more opportunities we give our babies to explore the world (by playing, practicing new skills, seeing new things and copying what others do), the more information is given to the brain.
For your newborn baby, you can:

[Days 0-7]:
<span style="display:block;padding-left:1em">Talk and sing to the baby <span style="display:block;padding-left:1em">Provide ways for your baby to see, hear, move arms and legs freely, and touch you <span style="display:block;padding-left:1em">Smile at your baby <span style="display:block;padding-left:1em">Touch and hold the infant with love

[Days 8 to month 6]:
<span style="display:block;padding-left:1em">PLAY: Provide ways for your child to see, hear, feel, move freely, and touch you. Slowly move colourful things for your child to see and reach for. Sample toys: shaker rattle, big ring on a string. <span style="display:block;padding-left:1em">COMMUNICATE: Smile and laugh with your child. Talk to your child. Get a conversation going by copying your child's sounds or gestures.
Jaribu sana kumfariji mtoto wako ila nilikuwa nataka kuongezea kuwa ni muhimu kumtizama mtoto machoni, kuwashika vizuri na kuongea nao muda wote. Msaidie Mama kuigiza tena na kutumia njia mpya.

Umejitahidi kumuonya mtoto wako kutofanya makosa. Ila kwa kuengezea Ni vyema kama mlezi kuhakikisha mtoto anakuwa na tabia njema. Njia hii ni bora kwa maendeleo ya mtoto kuliko kumtukana au kumpiga. Ikiwa mtoto atafanya jambo jema jaribu kumpongeza ili aendelee na tabia mzuri. Washawishi wanawake kuonyesha tena kutumia mbinu mpya.
MSHAURI: Muombe mlezi kuiga mienendo ya mtoto na kufata vile mtoto anavyotaka.

Naomba kujadiliana na wewe njia mzuri ya kuwarekebisha watoto wakiwa wamefanya makosa, kwa mfano jaalia mtoto anataka kuchukua kikombe cha chai moto, hili ni kosa, kwasababu huenda chai ikamwagikia akaungua. Je unaweza kunionesha ni vipi unaweza kumrekebisha mtoto katika hali hii?
Je umemuona mlezi akiwa anamfariji mtoto?
Je umemuona mlezi akimrekebisha mtoto wake?
Muapushe mtoto na vitendo visivyostahiki kwa kutumia vifaa vya kuchezea
Anamjibu mtoto kwa hasira na kumkaripia.
Haendi na mtoto anazuia mwenendo wa mtoto hamjibu mtoto.
anaenda karibu au na kutembea na mtoto, anaongea na mtoto na anamjibu mtoto
Wakati wa tembeleo ni vipi mlezi aliweza kuingiliana na kujibu mienendo, shughuli na milio ya mtoto?
Kwa maswali haya yafuatayo, CHUNGUZA maingiliano baina ya mlezi na mtoto ikiwa itawezekana. Ikiwa hukuweza kuchunguza mpaka unamaliza tembeleo, muombe mlezi akuoneshe._
Umefanya vizuri sana kumfariji mtoto na kumuonesha upendo. Unajua sana jinsi ya kuwafariji watoto. kwa mfano ni muhimu sana kumcheki mtoto kwenye macho, kuwashika vizuri, na kuongea nao muda wote.

Umefanya vizuri jinsi ulivyomuonya mtoto wako kutofanya makosa. Ni vyema kama mlezi kuhakikisha mtoto anakuwa na tabia njema. Njia hii ni bora kwa maendeleo ya mtoto kuliko kumtukana au kumpiga. Ikiwa mtoto atafanya jambo jema jaribu kumpongeza ili aendelee na tabia mzuri.
Matunzo kwa Maendeleo ya Mtoto (CCD): Tabia ya Mlezi na Mtoto
Je umri wa mtoto unaendana na maendeleo/ukuaji yake?

Umri wa mtoto ni miezi . Tabia za watoto kulingana na umri wao: Miezi 3 hadi 6: Husikiza milio. Hutazama na kufatiza macho kwenye vitu. Anapenda kuangalia watu usoni. Hutaka kuvishika vitu. Miezi 6 hadi 9: Unapojaribu kutabasamu na yeye anatabasamua. Huonesha ishara kama ana njaa. Anapiga kelele ili kuwasiliana. Anaweza kukaa kitako mwenyewe. Huwa anamtambua na anaitika kwa mlezi wake na rangi. Miezi 9 hadi 12: Anaanza kuzungumza na kuunda maneno ya kwanza Anajibu kwa walezi kwa maneno na kimwili Anaanza kutambaa Anasimama mwenyewe Kutembea mwenyewe au kwa msaada Miezi 12 hadi miaka 2: Kutembea mwenyewe. Majadiliano, na umri wa miaka 2 huanza kuunda sentensi fupi sana Anaanza kuunda maswali Anakula mwenyewe Kulala usiku mzima Miaka 2 au Zaidi: Anaanza kueleza anachokitaka, anaonesha vitu anavyovipenda, kuuliza maswali na kadhalika, anaweza kutunga sentensi mzima na anaanza kuhoji mambo yanayomzunguka.

Je kuna wanafamilia wengine au walezi ili washiriki katika mjadala huu unaohusu maendeleo ya mtoto? Hakikisha unamuhamisha baba kushiriki kama yupo, wakaribishe ili washiriki kwenye mjadala, pia muombe mama awe na mtoto wake karibu.

Kuwasiliana vizuri na mtoto wako ni muhimu sana kwani inakuza uhusiano bora na maendeleo ya afya ya mtoto wako. Kupitia kuzungumza na watoto na kuwaambia majina ya vitu, inawafanya wayajue maneno na hili linasaidia wao kuweza kuongea kwa urahisi.

Kucheza kuna umuhimu mkubwa kwa mtoto. Mtoto asiyepata fursa ya kucheza hatakuwa na maendeleo mazuri ya afya. Watoto wanajifunza kupitia kuona wanachofanya watu wengine, huiga na kufanya mambo mapya. Michezo ni njia bora ya kuwasaidia watoto kujifunza na kufanya mambo mapya.
Haongei na mtoto au anaongea kwa ukali na mtoto
Muangalie mtoto machoni n uongee nae kwa upole sana, uliza maswali
Anajaribu kulazimisha tabasamu au hamfanyii kazi mtoto.

Je unaweza kunionesha vipi unazungumza na mtoto wako? Je unaweza kuonesha unawafanyia nini ukitaka watabasamu?
Orodhesha mlezi anaongeaje na mtoto:

Ni vipi unacheza na mtoto wako?
Onesha kama njia mlezi anayocheza na mtoto kwa mfano kwa tumia toiz, michezo ya maneno au nyenginezo inayoendana na umri wake.

Hivi ni vizuri sana, kuwasiliana na mtoto wako kama hivi itakuza maendeleo ya afya ya mtoto wako. Kupitia kuzungumza na watoto na kuwaambia majina ya vitu, inawafanya wayajue maneno na hili linasaidia wao kuweza kuongea kwa urahisi.

MPONGEZE mlezi aliyeonesha jinsi anavyocheza na mtoto kwa maendeleo ya afya yao. Watoto wanajifunza kupitia walichokiona kutoka kwa wengine, huiga na kujifunza vitu vipya. kucheza ni njia mzuri ya kumsaidia mtoto kujifunza na kufanya vitu vipya. Kadiri tunavyotoa fursa watoto wetu kucheza ndio akili zao hupata taarifa na uelewa mpana. Kwa mfano mtoto anavyotikisa kengele anajifunza mlio unaojitokeza, wanajifunza jinsi ya kuizungusha kengele, pia inamsaidia kuwa imara mwilini. Muache mtoto akuoneshe mchezo gani anapenda kucheza na wewe usiwe wa kwanza kumuamulia vipi acheze.
Muitikie mtoto kulingana na sauti yake na anavyotaka. Muite jina lake na mtizame jinsi anavyojibu.
Njia nzuri za kuwasiliana na mtoto wako kwa umri huu ni:
Muulize mtoto wako maswali rahisi. Mjibu mtoto wako kadiri anavyojaribu kuzungumza muoneshe na zungumza huhusu asili, picha na vitu

Muhimize mtoto wako kuzungumza na jibu maswali ya mtoto wako. Wafunze watoto wako hadithi, nyimbo na michezo. Ongea kuhusu picha au vitabu. Watoto watasoma maneno kama utachora kitu alafu utalirejea neno. MSHAURI mlezi kwamba wanaweza kuchora picha mzuri kwenye madaftari ya watoto wenyewe, sio lazima wanunue dukani. Kwa mfano: Kitabu cha picha mambo ya kuchora ,kengele, pembea, baskeli.
Mwambie mtoto wako majina ya vitu na watu. Muoneshe mtoto wako jinsi ya kutumia maumbile ya mwili wakati anazungumza kwa mfano akisema "kwa heri" Sampuli ya Toiz mdoli.
Kucheza ni muhimu ili kuwezesha maendeleo ya afya. Kwa umri huu, njia mzuri ya kucheza na mtoto wako ni:
Msaidie mtoto wako hesabu, kujua majina ya vitu na kulinganisha vitu. Mfanyie toiz mwanao. Sampuli ya toiz: vitu vyenye rangi na maumbo tofauti bakora ili achague.
Mpatie mtoto wako kitu kisafi na salama ashike, kengele na chupa. Sampuli ya toiz: Vibakuli na mifuniko yake, Sufuria na Kijiko.
Ifiche Toiz ambayo mtoto anaipenda chini ya nguo au boksi, halafu uangalie kama anaweza kuifichua play peek-a-boo
Mpe vitu mtoto apange, pia aviweke kwenye kontena na kisha avitowe.

Njia mzuri ya kuwasiliana na mtoto wako katika umri huu: (onesha kwa vitendo) Tabasamu na cheka na mtoto wako. Ongea na mtoto wako. Fatilia mazungumzo kwa kujaribu kuiga sauti na jinsi mtoto anavyotumia lugha za ishara za mwili wake FANYA: Muombe Mlezi kuigiza lugha za ishara na sauti; kuigiza sauti ya mtoto na lugha ya ishara_ajaribu kutabasamu na kuona mtoto atafanyaje.

MSHAURI mlezi kwamba ajaribu kuzungumza na mtoto sana. Watoto huanza kutambua maneno mengi kabala hawajaanza kuongea, lakini kama hatutoongea na watoto wetu hawataweza kujifunza maneno mapya. Watoto huwa wanawasiliana na sisi wakiwa wachanga sana, na hata kabla hawajaanza kuongea huwa wanatwambia wanachohitaji na pia wanajua muda tukiwa tumefurahi au tumekasirika.

Kucheza ni muhimu sana kwa maendeleo ya afya ya mtoto. Mtoto asiye na fursa ya kucheza na kujifunza mambo mapya hatakuwa na maendeleo bora ya afya. Tunapaswa kuhakikisha watoto wetu wanapata fursa ya kutosha ya kucheza, kujifunza kufanya mambo mapya, kuona vitu vipya na kuiga watu wengine wanachokifanya. Kwamfano wanapotikisa kengele hujifunza ile sauti inayotoka wakati unapoitikisa kengele, pia hujifunza jinsi ya kuizungusha kengele. Pendekeza mchezo mmoja ambao mlezi anaweza kujaribu kucheza na mtoto wake na waelekeze jinsi kuucheza na mtoto. Kisha sisitiza jinsi mtoto anavyofurahi pale anapochezana mlezi wake.

Kwa umri huu, njia mzuri ya kucheza na mtoto ni: (Onesha) Andaa njia za mtoto wako kuona, kusikia, kuhisi, kutembea kwa uhuru, na kukugusa. Jaribu kuhamisha polepole vitu anavyovipenda mtoto wako ili avione na kuvifikia. (Mfano wa toiz: kengele, pete kubwa iliyofungwa kwenye kamba) Katika umri huu watoto wana tabia ya kuingiza mdomoni kila wanachokipata. Walezi wasiwakataze kufanya hivyo kwasababu mdomo ndio kiungo kikubwa cha hisia kwao kipindi hiki, ambacho wanakitumia kuonja ladha, ulaini na ugumu wa kitu. Ni njia ya kujifunza. Cha msingi ni kuhakikisha unampatia mtoto kitu kilicho salama na safi na kiwe kikubwa ili kuhakikisha hawakimezi.
Muangalie mtoto machoni na uongee nae kwa upole sana
Anajaribu kulazimisha tabasamu au hamjibu mtoto.
Fanyia kazi sauti na vitendo vya mtoto ili kupata tabasamu la mtoto

Je unaweza kunionesha jinsi unavyoongea na mwanao au kumfanya atabasamu?
Onesha jinsi mlezi anavyoingiliana na mtoto.
Mfanye mtoto ashughulike nawe kwa kutumia cherewa au kitu chengine cha kuchezea.
Chezesha miguu na mikono ya mtoto au mpige pige mtoto kwa upole sana

Je unaweza ukanionesha jinsi unavyocheza na mtoto wako? Naomba nioneshe tafadhali. Unafikri watoto wako wanajifunza kitu gani wakati mkicheza?
Onesha jinsi mama anavyoingiliana na mtoto wake.

MPONGEZE mlezi kwa kuwasiliana vizuri na mtoto. Watoto huwa wanawasiliana na sisi hata pale wanapokuwa katika umri mdogo. Hata kabla hawajaanza kuongea huwa wanatwambia wanachohitaji na pia wanajua nyakati tukiwa tumefurahi au tumekasirika. Kupitia kuzungumza na watoto wetu na kuwaambia majina ya vitu kunawafanya wayatambue majina na hili linawasidia kuweza kuongea kwa urahisi. Kurejea rejea ni njia ya mzuri ya mtoto kujifunza.

MPONGEZE mama kwa jinsi alivyocheza na mtoto wake vizuri. Mtoto anajifunza kupitia michezo na hujaribu kufanya baadhi ya vitu. Huchunguza na kuiga kile watu wanachokifanya kwamfano wakitikisa kengele hujifunza sauti inayotoka kwenye kengele pia hujifunza kuizungusha kengele.

Ningelipenda kuongea na nyinyi kuhusu tabia na maendeleo ya mtoto wenu. Chunguza jinsi wanavyofatilia mazungumzo yako. Hizi ni nyakati muhimu sana kwa watoto katika maisha yao, kipindi hiki watoto ndio hujifunza hivyo inategemea na matendo yenu kwani mnachokifanya ndio watachojifunza.
Ningependa kukuuliza maswali kuhusu jinsi mtoto wako anavyojifunza na kujadili jinsi ya kucheza na kuwasiliana na mtoto wako ili kuwasaidia wakuwe vyema na waweze kujifunza.
Wakaribishe walezi na familia na wahamasishe kushiriki kwenye mjadala.
Matunzo kwa ajili ya Maendeleo ya Mtoto. (CCD): Tathmini maendeleo na fundisha kuhusu mawasiliano na michezo
Je mtoto anaona baridi au ana kiwango cha chini cha joto?
Je mtoto amewahi kupata degedege kwa siku za karibuni?
Mtoto anaonesha kuwa ana dalili za hatari. Mshauri mama aende kituo cha afya kilichopo karibu naye ndani ya saa 24 ili daktari amuone mtoto na kumsaidia.
Je mtoto anapumua kwa tabu au kwa haraka (anapumua mara 60 au zaidi kwa daikika moja)?
Je mtoto anaweza kunywa au kunyonya maziwa ya mama?
Je mtoto anaweza kula na kunywa?
Je mtoto anaweza kunyonya maziwa ya mama?
Je mtoto an homa au joto kali?
Je mtoto analegea na kupoteza fahamu?
Je mtoto ana majipu katika ngozi?
Hakuna dalili ya hatari yoyote iliyoonekana kwa mtoto wako, lakini ikitokea mtoto ameonesha dalili yoyote ya hatari tulizojadili, hakikisha unamuwahisha kituo cha afya kilichopo karibu nawe haraka.

Ningependa tujadili jinsi ya kukihifadhi vinyesi vya Watoto, kinyesi cha mtoto kinaweza kuwa hatari au chanzo cha maradhi.
Ni wapi mtoto wako anajisaidia? Ni wapi unapokitupa kinyesi cha mtoto wako?
Choo cha shimo kisicho na paipu
Choo chenye kikalio ambacho kina paipu
Kutumia choo inaweza kusadia kukuepusha na usambaaji wa maradhi. Ikiwa upo uwezekano, ni vyema ukawa na choo ndani mwako.

Mueleze mama hatari ya kinyesi cha mtoto na njia salama ya kukihifadhi: Njia salama ya kukihifadhi kinyesi cha mtoto ni kumsaidia mtoto aweze kujisaidia chooni au kukitupa kinyesi cha watoto wachanga kwenye shimo la choo. Upo ushahidi unaoonesha kuwa kinyesi cha mtoto ni hatari zaidi kuliko cha mtu mzima. Vinyesi vya watoto ni vyema vikahifadhiwa kama vya watu wazima, kutumia njia salama ya kuvitupa ambayo itahakikisha watu hawakutani navyo au havileti uchafuzi kwenye kaya.

Habari mama? Kama tulivyozungumza wakati wa matembeleo yetu yaliyopita kuwa ntakuja kukutembelea kwa ajili ya kujua maendeleo na afya ya mtoto/watoto, na pia kujadiliana na wewe pamoja na familia juu ya malezi na makuzi bora ya mtoto/watoto wako. Nafahamu kuwa unajua jinsi ya kumtunza mtoto wako na kumkuza vizuri, lakini hii ni kama nyongeza tu ya elimu kutokana na ongezeko la maradhi na matatizo mbali mbali yanayoweza kudhoofisha afya na makuzi bora ya mtoto.
Tarehe ya mwisho ya tembeleo:
Jina: Umri: miaka, miezi, siku Mtu wa karibu kwa mawasiliano: Namba ya nyumba: Kitongoji: .

Kwa vile nilishamsajili mtoto kwenye huduma za afya za mtoto, leo nitaangalia afya yake, na nitakuwa narudia kumtembelea kadiri anavyoendelea kukuwa ili kuhakikisha kuwa anakuwa na afya bora. Je mnakubaliana na hili?
Isalimie familia na waalike wengine waliopo washiriki kwenye mazungumzo ikiwa inahitajika.
Je! Wewe au mlezi ana matatizo yoyote kwamba mtoto hajibu au inaonekana kuwa mgumu wa kujifunza?
Naomba nikuulize baadhi ya maswali maalumu yanayohusu maendeleo ya mtoto wako

Kuwa na mtoto ambaye ni mzito wa kujifunza kunaweza kukufanya ujiskie vibaya. Mtoto anayechelewa katika maendeleo anahitaji msaada zaidi wa kulishwa na kujifunza mambo mapya. Muda wa ziada unahitajika kumsaidia kula, kucheza naye na kuwasiliana naye ili mtoto aweze kupata uwezo mpya.
Asante kwa kueza kuzungumza na mimi leo kuhusu mambo haya, nimegundua tatizo ambalo nakushauri uwende kumuona daktari ili akusaidie, nitakupa rufaa uende kituo cha karibu nawe.
Ipe rufaa familia kwenye vipimo vya usikivu na uoni kama kuna hitajio.
Ukilinaganisha na watoto wengine je mtoto wako anaonekana ni mzito kiakili, si mchangamfu au ni mgumu kujifunza?
Je, mtoto wako anaweza kuita jina la kitu japo kimoja (kwa mfano, mnyama, toiz, kikombe au kijiko)?
Je, mtoto wako anajifunza kufanya baadhi vitu kama vile wanavyofanya watoto wa umri wake?
Ukilinganisha na watoto wengine je mtoto wako ana tatizo lolote linahusiana na kuchelewa kukaa, kusimama au kutembea?
Je, mtoto wako ana tatizo la kusikia( anatumia kifaa kinachomsaidia kusikia, anasikia kwa shida, hasikii kabisa)?
Ukilinganisha na watoto wengine je mtoto wako ana tatizo la uoni nyakati za usiku au machana?.
Je, mtoto wako anapata shida wakati wa kutembea au anapojaribu kuzungusha mikono yake au Je ana udhaifu wowote kwenye miguu na mikono?
Je, mtoto wako anaweza kuzungumza Je anaweza kuzungumza maneno yanayoeleweka?
Je, mtoto wako wakati mwingine ana degedege/kukukutika/mdudu, inakuwa ngumu, au kupoteza fahamu?
Je, mtoto wako anazungumza tofauti na inavyopaswa kuwa (mazungumzo yake hayaeleweki vizuri na watu wengine isipokuwa watu wa karibu wa familia yake)?
Unapomuambia mtoto wako afanye kitu fulani je anaonekana anakuelewa ulichomwambia?
Matunzo kwa Maendeleo ya Mtoto (CCD): Mambo Yanayohusu Maendele ya Mtoto

ULIZA na CHUNGUZA: Je vipi mtoto anahifadhiwa? Mpongeze mlezi ikiwa mtoto huwa anafunikwa vizuri na kuwa karibu na mama yake, na ikiwa anakoshwa kwa maji ya vuguvugu na kukaushwa haraka. Ikiwa sio, jaribu kutatua tatizo. Angalia ukurasa wa 10 wa Bango Kitita kwa melezo zaidi.

Je unamuekaje mtoto ukitaka kumnyonyesha? Unanyonyesha kila baada ya kipindi gani? mtoto anachukua muda gani kunyonya kwa mara moja? SIKILIZA: Mruhusu mama kueleza uzoefu wake wa kunyonyesha punde baada ya kujifungua.
Ningependa kuzungumza na wewe kuhusu unyonyeshaji wa mtoto.

Muelimishe mama umuhimu wa kumnyonyesha mwanawe maziwa ya mama pekee kwa miezi sita ya mwanzo na muhamasishe kunyonesha mtoto mwara kwa mara. Fungua kadi namba 13 katika bango kitita kwa maelezo zaidi.
Je mtoto ananyonyeshwa maziwa ya mama peke yake?
Ipongeze familia ikiwa mtoto ananyonyeshwa maziwa ya mama peke yake.
Je unaendeleaje na kunyonyesha? Je una tatizo lolote unahitaji tujadili? Jadili tatizo na mama.
Jadiliana na mama kwanini hamnyonyeshi mtoto maziwa yake tu. Mshauri na kutatua tatizo.

CHUNGUZA: kama kuna uwezekano muombe mama amnyonyeshe mtoto wake na chunguza, ikiwa hakuna uwezekano muulize mama maswali kuliko kumchunguza. Osha mikono yako. CHUNGUZA Je mama anayenyonyesha anaelewa hili ? Je umegundua kuna tatizo lolote kwenye kunyonyesha? Toa muongozo kwa kile ulichokiona. Jaribu kutatua tatizo lolote uliloliona au alilolisema mama.
Baada ya kujifungua, ni muda gani ulichukua kuanza kumnyonyesha mtoto wako?
Huduma muhimu ya watoto wachanga: Kuhifadhi na kunyonyesha
Muelimishe mama njia nzuri za upakataji na uwekaji wa mtoto katika ziwa ili kufanikisha unyonyrshaji. Fungua bango kitita kadi namba 16 na 17.

Je, upakataji na uwekaji wa mtoto katika titi uko sawa? Hii inamaanisha kuwa kidevu kinagusa titi,kinywa cha mtoto kimeachama sawasawa, mdomo wa chini wa mtoto unabinuka kwa nje, sehemu kubwa nyeusi ya titi inaonekana zaidi juu ya kinywa cha mtoto kuliko chini.

Msaidie Mama kufanya haya yafuatayo: Kukaa au kulala vizuri. Mshike mtoto mwili mzima, sio shingo tu na mabega. Hakikisha kichwa cha mtoto na mwili vimenyooka. Mtoto atazame ziwa la mama. Pua ya mtoto iwe mkabala na kinyonyeo. Alishike ziwa na mgusishe mtoto nalo kwenye mdomo wake ili mtoto afungue mdomo. Hakikisha mdomo wa mtoto umekaa vizuri kwenye ncha ya ziwa la mama. Hakikisha mtoto amewekwa vyema ili kuweza kunyonya vizuri. Agusishe mdomo wa mtoto na kinyonyeo.
Mpongeze mama kwa kumuweka vizuri mtoto wake wakati wa kumnyonyesha.

Msaidie mama kujua Zaidi kumuweka vizuri mtoto kwa ajili ya kumnyonyesha. Muongozo wa kumuweka mtoto vizuri wakati wa kunyonya: Kama mtoto analala sana na anakosa kunyonya, muamshe kwa kupapasa mwili wake, miguu au mikono. Ikiwa mtoto bado hanyonyi baada ya saa moja, kamua maji maji ya mwanzo ya njano kutoka kwenye maziwa kwenye kikombe au kijiko kilicho safi. Mpe mtoto anywe mara kwa mara na kwa kiwango kidogo, hakikisha mtoto anaweza kumeza. Kugusisha midomo ya mtoto kwa kinyonyeo chake. Asubiri hadi mdomo wa mtoto umefunguka sana. Amuweke mtoto haraka kwenye maziwa akitega mdomo wa chini wa mtoto vizuri chini ya kinyonyeo. Kama maziwa yamevimba, pakaza kiwango kidogo cha maziwa kabla ya kuanza kumnyonyesha mtoto ili kulainisha kinyonyeo na iwe rahisi kwa mtoto kunyonya.
Mpongeze mama na mshauri kuendelea kufanya hivyo.
Huduma muhimu ya watoto wachanga: Upakataji na uwekaji wa mtoto katika titi.

Usafi ni muhimu wakati wa chakula cha ziada, mshauri hivi mama: Usafi ni muhimu huzuiya mtoto kuharisha. Tumia kjiko na kikombe safi wakati wa kumlisha na kumnywesha mtoto. Kosha mikono yako kwa sabuni na maji yanaotiririka mara kwa mara.
Usafi ni muhimu wakati wa chakula cha ziada, mshauri hivi mama: Usafi ni muhimu huzuiya mtoto kuharisha. Kosha mikono yako kwa sabuni na maji yanaotiririka mara kwa mara.

Sasa naomba tuongee kuhusu usafi wa chakula: Usafi ni mzuri na muhimu kwa kujikinga na maradhi ya kuharisha. Tumia kijiko au kikombe safi wakati wa kumlisha au kumnywesha mtoto. Kosha mikono yako kwa sabuni na maji yanayotiririka mara kwa mara, hasa kabla ya kuanza kumlisha mtoto.
Ikiwa mtoto wako hanyonyi tena, tafadhali hakikisha anapata chakula chenye afya na kilicho bora.

Endeleae kumnyonyesha mtoto wako kwa mujibu wa mahitaji yake muda wote, usiku na mchana. Hili litafanya afya ya mtoto kutengemaa na kumfanya awe na nguvu, kwani maziwa ya mama ni chakula muhimu sana kwa mtoto.

Jaribu kupika vyakula tofauti tofauti kwa ajili ya mtoto: Kila wiki unaweza kuongeza aina mpya ya chakula kwa mtoto. Mlishe mtoto chakula cha ziada mara mbili kwa siku. Mpe mtoto ladha tofauti mara mbili au tatu kwenye kila mlo. Maziwa ya mama yabaki kuwa ni chakula kikuu kwenye umri huu wa mtoto. Endelea kunyonyesha kwa mujibu wa mahitaji ya mtoto. Kunywa maji masafi na ya kawaida ni kitu kizuri kwa afya ya mtoto. Mlishe mtoto kwenye chombo cha peke yake.
Matunzo muhimu ya mtoto mdogo -- Lishe

Kikawaida kamba iliyopo kwenye kitovu cha mtoto wako hukauka na kudondoka chenyewe ndani ya wiki moja ua mbili baada ya mtoto kuzaliwa. Katika kipindi hiki hakikisha unakitunza kipaswavyo: Hakikisha kinakuwa kikavu: jaribu kukiruhusu kipate hewa ili iwe rahisi kukauka. Unapomfunga mtoto wako hakikisha unamfunga kwa chini ya kitovu ili kuepuka kukifunika. Usiingize kitu chochote kwenye kitovu cha mtoto_unapoeka kitu chochote inaweza kusababisha madhara kwa mtoto. Muogeshe kwa kumfuta. Kumuogesha kwa kumfuta ni vizuri, itasaidia kuafanya kitovu kikauke haraka. Iache kamba ya kitovu idondoke yenyewe epuka kujaribu kuivuta ili kidondoke.
Huduma muhimu kwa watoto wachanga: Jinsi ya kukitunza kitovu.
[Siku 0-7:] Ongea na mwimbie mtoto. Mhamasishe aweze kuangalia, kusikiliza, kurusha miguu na mikono na kugusa vitu. Muoneshe tabasamu. Mshike mtoto wa upendo.

[Siku 8 hadi miezi 6]: MCHEZO: Toa njia za mtoto wako kuangalia, kusikiliza, kurusha mikono na miguu kwa uhuru, na kukugusa. Pole pole msogezee mtoto wako vitu vya rangi kwa ajili ya kuviangalia na kuvifuatilia. Mfano: Vitu vya kuchezea: kitairi kikubwa kwenye uzi, mwiko. WASILIANA: Tabasamu na cheka. Zungumza na mtoto wako. Hojiana kwa kuiga sauti ya mtoto wako au ishara.

Wewe na mwenzako/ mume wako au familia muna jukumu la kuhakikisha maendeleo ya akili ya mtoto na katika kipindi hiki cha miezi na miaka ya mwanzoni ni vyema kutumiwa vyema ili kuifanya akili yake ikuwe vizuri
Mtoto mchanga anaweza kuona vitu, kuvihisi, na anaweza kujibu sauti na milio huwa anasikia. Mtoto anaweza kutuambia kuwa anaona njaa au hana furaha kwa kwa sauti yake. Mtoto huwa anapenda kuona sura ya mama na baba yake (walezi wake wa karibu.)[ angalia tafsiri kwenye muongozo wa kazi]
Kadiri tunavyowapa nafasi watoto wetu kudadisi wanayaona (kwa kucheza, kufanya mambo mapya, kuona vitu vipya na kuiga) ndio kadiri tunavyoweza kuwafanya wawe na akili.

Huduma muhimu/za lazima kwa mtoto mchanga: Kuchangamsha

Lengo ni kukagua kama mtoto amezaliwa na uzito mdogo au la!
Ingiza uzito wa mtoto kwa Kilo.
Kwa kukisia mtoto aliazaliwa na ukubwa wa kiasi gani?
Iangalie kadi ya mtoto au Kijitabu cha huduma za mtoto njiti ili kupanga matembeleo ya ufatiliaji. Mshauri mama arudi kituo cha afya kwa matembeleo ya ufatiliaji.
Je umepatiwa huduma maalumu wanayopatiwa watoto waliozaliwa wadogo hospitali?
Huu ni ukubwa wa kawaida wa mtoto kwahivyo anahitaji apate uangalizi wa kawaida. Utajifaunza ni jinsi gani tunapaswa kutunza watoto waliozaliwa na ukubwa wa kawaida baadae.
Mpe rufaa kwenye wodi ya watoto njiti.
Mtoto huyu amezaliwa mdogo hivyo anahitaji uangalizi wa ziada kutoka kwa wahudumu wa afya wa jamii wa kujitolea na familia. Tutazungumza kuhusu uangalizi maalumu anaopaswa kupatiwa mtoto wako.
anaaendelea vyema na hahitaji kwenda kituo cha Afya kwa sasa. Utarudi kumkagua tena wakati wa tembeleo jengine.
Ili kushughulikia dalili za hatari za dharura za mtoto.
Ili kushughulikia maswala ya kujifunza na maendeleo ya mtoto.
Ili kushughulikia dalili za hatari za dharura za mtoto mchanga.
anahitaji kupelekwa kituo cha Afya kwa sababu zifuatazo:
Ili kushughulikia dalili za hatari za mtoto mchanga.
Apate huduma maalum kwa ajili ya watoto wadogo.
Umekataa kupata huduma ya Afya ya jamii. Sitofanya tembeleo lolote linalohusu Afya ya jamii kwake .
Wahamasishe wazazi kumpeleka mtoto kituo cha Afya haraka iwezekanavyo ili kupata huduma. Wataarifu kwamba utarejea baada ya siku tatu kuhakikisha kwamba wameweza kupata huduma stahiki kituo cha Afya.

Ni muhimu kunawa mikono yako kwa maji na sabuni kabla ya kushika mtoto.
Watoto wachanga wanaweza kupata maambukizi kwa urahisi zaidi kuliko mtu mzima au Maambukizo yanayoweza kuhama kutoka kwa mtu mzima kwenda kwa mtoto yanaweza kuwa hatari kwa sababu kinga ya watoto bado ni dhaifu / haijatengenezwa kikamilifu hivyo unawaji wa mikono kwa usahihi ni mojawapo ya njia bora sana za kuzuia maambukizi.
Mambo yanayopaswa kuwepo ili kukosha mikono vizuri: Tunahitaji maji safi yenye kutiririka na sabuni. Ikiwa maji na sabuni hamna unaweza kutumia jivu.
Nyakati muhimu za kukosha mikono ni: Baada ya kutoka chooni. Kabla ya kumlisha mtoto. Kabla ya kula. Baada ya kumsafisha mtoto. Kabla ya kuandaa chakula. Baada ya kutengeneza nyama, samaki au kuku.
Muombe mama ahakikishe kuwa wahudumu wa kituo cha afya wanaandika rikodi kuhusu chanjo kwenye kadi la afya la mtoto.
Naomba uniitie Mumeo au wanafamilia ili nipate kuwaeleza umuhimu wa chanjo.
Sasa nitapendelea kupitia kadi la kliniki la mtoto kuhakikisha amepata/wamepata chanjo zote stahiki mpaka sasa. Je, Una kadi la kliniki la mtoto wako?

INGIZA chanjo zilizoanishwa kwenye kadi ya mtoto ya kliniki ndani ya kitendea kazi chako (chanjo ambazo unaweza kuwa umeingiza wakati wa tembeleo lililopita hazitooneshwa).

Kawaida mtoto akishachomwa sindano ya chanjo ya BCG inabidi baada ya miezi mitatu kovu ionekanwe kwenye bega la kulia la mtoto. Kama hutoona kovu imetokea, mshauri mama ampeleke mtoto kituo cha Afya na kuwaambia watoa huduma waliopo kituo cha Afya ili apatiwe chanjo tena.

Sawa, taafadhali hakikisha unaendelea kumtunza mtoto wako vizuri.
Mpongeze mama na mkumbushe kuhusu tarehe ya chanjo nyengine kama kadi ilinavyoonesha. mkumbushe kuwa kuna umuhimu mkubwa ikiwa mtoto wake atapatiwa chanjo zote kwa muda uliopangwa.

Ikiwa mtoto wako analia kwa zaidi ya masaa 3 au ukiwa unahofu jinsi anavyooneka au anavyojiskia, nenda kituo cha afya haraka. Ni mara chache sana kujitokeza kwa athari yoyote mbaya. Lakini inaweza kujitokeza baadhi ya muda mtu anapotumia dawa yoyote ile.

Baada ya kupata chanjo, mtoto wako anaweza kupata homa, upele au maumivu kwenye mkono au mguu katika maeneo ambayo amechomwa sindano. Mnyonyeshe mtoto wako. Hii hali ni ya kawaida kujitokeza wala sio tatizo ikiwa hali hii itachelewa kuondoka au una shaka yoyote nenda kituo cha afya na ufate ushauri wataokupatia.
Toa ushauri nasaha kuhusu umuhimu wa chanjo na mpe rufaa aende kituo cha afya.
Washauri kuhusu ratiba ya chanjo kituoni na wape taarifa kuhusu upatikanaji wake, jitahidi uhakikishe kuwa mama anahudhuria kwenye chanjo siku iliyopangwa.
Ikiwa kuna umuhimu, mkumbushe mama kuwa chanjo zote ni muhimu kwa ajiili ya kumkinga mtoto na maradhi kama vile kuharisha, polio,surua, Kifua kikuu, nimonia, na mengineyo.

Je mtoto ana tatizo la kutokukojoa kwa siku?
Je mtoto halii au hapumui kama kawaida?
Je mtoto ana tapika mara moja moja?
Hakuna dalili yoyote ya hatari iliyogundulika, lakini iwapo mtoto ataonesha dalili yoyote kati ya tulizojadili, unapaswa kwenda kituo cha Afya haraka iwezekanavyo.
Dalili ya hatari imegundulika. Mshauri mama aende kituo cha Afya kilicho karibu nae ndani ya masaa 24 yajayo ili Daktari aweze kumuangalia mtoto na kutoa msaada.
Ikiwa ulikuwa unamtebelea mama yake wakati wa ujauzito, basi punde tu utakapomaliza temebeleo la mtoto, tafadhali endelea na tembeleo la baada ya kujigungua.
Ukumbusho wa kufanya tembeleo la mama mjamzito

Watu wengi hupata changamoto wakati wanapocheza na kuwasiliana na watoto wao, ili kuhamasisha maendeleo ya mtoto. Ningependa nizungumze nawe kuhusu baadhi ya changamoto maarufu ambazo wazee zinawakuta.
Wakati wa tembeleo lako je uliona hali yoyote inayoonesha mtoto analelewa vibaya au ukali?
Je unakwazwa na hali ya wewe kuondoka na kumuacha mtoto kwa mtu mwengine kwa kipindi fulani?
Je mazingira ya familia ni yenye malumbano na yenye kusabisha msongo wa mawazo?
Je unahisi kutokuwa na toiz ni tatizo?
Ni siku ngapi katika wiki iliyopita mtoto aliachiwa mtoto mwenziwe aliye chini ya miaka 10 amlee kwa zaidi ya saa moja?

Baadhi ya mda walezi huondoka nyumbani na kwenda dukani, kuosha nguo au kwa sababu nyengine tofauti na ikabidi kuwaacha watoto.
Ni siku ngapi nyuma mtoto aliachwa peke yake nyumbani kwa zaidi ya saa moja?
Mtoto ametajiwa, amehesabiwa, amechorewa vitu kwa ajili yake.
Hakuna kimoja wapo kati ya hivyo.
kusoma vitabu au kuangalia picha za vitabu
Huwez kuchaguwa "Hakuna moja wapo" na chaguo jengine
Siku tatu zilizopita nyuma, Je mama au mwanafamilia yoyote aliye na umri wa miaka 15 au zaidi amefanya akiwa na mtoto shughuli hizi zifuatazo?
Je huwa unajiskia vibaya au mwenye kuchoshwa kucheza na kuwasiliana na mtoto wako?
Je unahisi huna muda wa kutosha wakucheza na kuwasiliana?

Chagua mchezo 1 na shughuli moja ya mawasiliano kutoka kwenye muongozo wa michezo na mawasiliano kulingana na umri wa mtoto. Waoneshe wazee picha na waelezee shughuli. Wape nafasi walezi wafanye shughuli. Chunguza maingiliano na wasaidie walezi wawe wanafatilia mienendo ya mtoto. Dhamiria kuwasaidia walezi na mtoto kuwa na mafanikio ya maingiliano ya pande mbili jinsi mlezi akiangalia, kusikiliza na kumjibu mtoto. Ikiwa mtoto hawezi kufanya shughuli yoyote chagua mchezo unaoendana na umri wa mtoto au pendekeza njia ya kufanya mchezo uwe rahisi. Ikiwa mtoto ni mkubwa kidogo na anaweza kwa urahisi, pendekeza njia za kumsaidia mtoto kujifunza kitu kipya au chagua shughuli kutoka kwa umri mkubwa kidogo unaolingana na yeye. Muhimize mlezi kuendelea na mchezo na shughuli za mawasiliano.
Je nyumbani kwako kuna vitabu vingapi vya watoto au vitabu vyenye picha au kadi?
Je mtoto huwa anachezea na toiz zilizotengezwa nyumbani kama vile midoli, magari au toiz nyengine zinazotengezwa nyumbani.
Je mtoto anacheza na vitu vinavyopatikana nyumbani kama vile upawa, masufuria au vitu anavyoukutana navyo nje kama vile bakora, vipuri vya wanyama au majani?
Je mtoto anachezea toiz kutoka madukani au zilizosanifiwa?
Wacha tujifunze michezo mipya na njia nyengine za kuwasiliana. Mambo haya yatamsaidia mtoto wako kwenye uoni, usikivu, kugusa, kubadilisha mawazo au hisia.

Ikiwa una shaka kwamba huenda mtoto hayupo salama kutokana na adhabu kali mpe rufaa haraka iwezekanavyo kwa Mratibu wa Wanawake na Watoto wa Shehia au Sheha ambaye atakusaidia kuwasiliana na mamlaka sahihi au mtu sahihi. Pia unaweza kumpeleka kituo cha police kilichopo karibu nawe au kituo cha mkono kwa mkono.

Adhabu kali kwa mtoto hazitamsaidia kuwa na maendeleo mazuri ya afya. Kuwarekebisha na kuwafundisha watoto kwa namna nzuri ni kitu kinachoshauriwa zaidi. Msifie mtoto akifanya jambo zuri mpe uhuru mtoto achague lipi la kufanya badala ya kusema "usifanye''.

Hali ya kuwaacha watoto kwa mtu mwengine pia ni moja ya changamoto inayowakumba mama na walezi wengi, orodhesha angalau mtu mmoja (aliye na umri wa zaidi ya miaka 10) ambaye atakuwa anawatunza watoto wako, kuwaandalia na kuwapa upendo. Mtu huyu ni lazima ashauri njia mzuri ya kuwatunza watoto. Mmoja kati ya changamoto unazoweza kupata ikiwa mtoto wako analelewa na mlezi mwengine na mtoto hataki kukaa mbali nawe, kila mda anapenda awe na wewe tu, kama ukimuacha mtoto wako atalia hii sana huwa linajitokeza. Ila itafika mda watoto watomzoea mlezi wao mpya, unachopaswa kufanya kuwa na subra. Wala usiogope. Washajihishe mama na baba watenge muda wa kucheza na mtoto ikiwa kuna uwezekano
Tafadhali kuwa na tahadhari unapomuacha mtoto na walezi wengine ili kuepuka majanga yanayoweza kutokezea.

Msikilize mlezi jinsi anavyojiskia na msaidie kuorodhesha mtu muhimu ambaye anaweza kumsimulia hisia zake na kumsaidia mtoto wake Muhamasishe mlezi na ndugu wa familia wawe pamoja kumsaidia mama kucheza na kuwasiliana na mtoto Wajengee uwezo/Imani kwa kuwaonesha uwezo walio nao kufanikisha jambo dogo

Watoto huiga matendo ya wazee. Jaribu kupunguza hasira na msongo wa mawazo: Waepushe watoto na malumbano na migogoro? Jaribu kuwahakikishia watoto kuwa migogoro na malumbano yanayojitokeza siyo makossa yao na unawapenda sana.

Tatizo la Kuwa muda wakutosha ni kitu ambacho mama na walezi wengi kinawakuta, njia moja unaweza kujaribu ni kucheza na mtoto muda wowote unapokuwa naye, kwamfano ukiwa unapika mlo wa usiku na mtoto akiwa yupo karibu nawe, unaweza kujaribu kutenga mda kidogo kucheza na mtoto wako.
Changamoto nyengine ni kuwa unaweza kujikuta huna muda wa kutosha wa kuwasaidia wanafamilia. Nashauri ni vyema ukazungumza na wanafamilia waambie kuwa unajikuta umeelemewa majukumu mengi nyumbani na kumshughulikia mtoto. Unaweza kujaribu kuwahamasisha wanafamilia kutenga mda kucheza na mtoto.

Ukweli ni kwamba karibu kila kitu kinaweza kuwa toiz. Siyo lazima utumie pesa nyingi kununa toiz. Unaweza kutumia baadhi ya vitu vinavyopatikana majumbani ambavyo ni visafi na salama. Unaweza kutumia kitambaa kwa ajili ya kutengeza toiz. La msingi hakikisha ni safi na salama. Sasa ningependelea nikusaidie kufikiri ni toiz zipi tunaweza kutengeneza kwa kutumia mambo tuliyonayo nyumbani. Onesha jinsi gani mlezi anaweza kutumia mambo yanayopatikana nyumbani kufanya toi kwa mtoto. Onesha mifano inayoendana na umri wa mtoto. Ikiwa watoto ni wakubwa, washajihishe wazee kutengeza mambo ambayo hayatawagharimu au kutumia fedha nyingi kutengeza toi kwa watoto wao. Cheza na mtoto. Mtoto hujifunza kupitia kucheza na walezi na watu wengine.
Je ni nani huwa anacheza na kuwasiliana na mtoto?
Ni jumla ya masaa mangapi umetumia wewe au mwanafamilia yoyote aliye na zaidi ya miaka 15 kucheza na mtoto kipindi cha siku tatu nyuma?
Matunzo kwa Maendeleo ya Mtoto (CCD): Kutatua Tatizo
Je mtoto ananyonyeshwa maziwa ya mama peke yake?

Eleza yafuatayo kuhusu umuhimu wa kumnyonyesha mtoto njiti angalau kwa masaa 2-3: Maziwa ya mama ni chakula bora sana kwa mtoto njiti kwani humkinga na maambukizi. Watoto njiti wanatakiwa mwanyonyeshwe mara kwa mara kwasababu huwa wananyonya kidogo tu. Ikiwa mtoto atalala zaidi ya masaa 2 , muamshe kwa kugusagusa kwenye viganja au migunii ili umnyonyeshe hata nyakati za usiku.

Fungua mjadala kwa kuanza kutoa maana ya "Mtoto njiti'': Mtoto njiti ni mtoto aliyezaliwa na uzito usiozidi kilogram 2 ambao ni uzito mdogo ambao si wa kawaida kwa watoto wanaozaliwa sasa. Uzito mdogo zaidi ni ule usiozidi kilogram 1.5 wakati mtoto anapozalia

Ningependa kuzungumza na wewe kuhusu kunyonyesha
Je ushawahi kunyonyesha?
Wapongeze wanafamilia ikiwa mtoto ananyonyeshwa maziwa ya mama tu.

Wacha tujifunze jinsi ya kumueka mtoto vizuri mtoto wakati wa kumnyonyesha. Je unaweza kunionesha jinsi gani unamueka mtoto wako? _Msaidie mama kuboresha jinsi ya kumueka mtoto: muombe amgusishe mtoto ncha ya ziwa kwenye midomo yake, subiria hadi mtoto afungue mdomo wake vizuri, na muingizie mtoto ziwa karibu na mdomo wa chini._ _Muombe mama akuoneshe jinsi anavyomueka mtoto wake wakati wa kumnyonyesha._
Jadiliana na mama kwanini hamnyonyeshi mtoto wake mara kwa mara na kama inavyopaswa.

Mtoto aliyezaliwa mdogo anaweza kuwa na mambo mengi ya kuzingatia kifya kuliko mtoto mwengine. Hivyo kuna umuhimu wa kumuangalia dalili za hatari, kumueka katika hali ya ujoto na kuwanyonyesha inavyopaswa ili kumfanya awe afya bora. Tutajifunza kuhusu mambo ambayo mtoto njiti yanaweza kumkuta na jinsi ya kumsaidia
Je mtoto anapewa/analishwa kitu chochote zaidi ya maziwa ya mama?
Hongera sana,maziwa ya mama yana virutubisho vya kutosha na chakula kamili kwa mwanao. Endelea kumnyonyesha mwanao maziwa ya mama tu kwa muda wa miezi 6 bila ya kumpa kitu kingine chochote.

Si vyema mtoto ambaye ana umri wa chini ya miezi 6 kupewa vitu/vyakula vingine vyovyote ziaidi ya maziwa ya mama. Hili litasababisha maziwa kupungua na kumletea mtoto madhara kama kuumwa na tumbo na kuharisha.
Ni muda gani mama alianza kumshonyesha mtoto wake punde baada ya kumzaa?
zaidi ya mara tano kwa siku
Ni kwa kiasi gani unamnyonyesha mtoto wako, Ikiwemo usiku na mchana?

Kamba ya kitovu cha mtoto wako kinakauka na hata kuanguka, kikawaida ndani ya wiki au wiki mbili baada ya kuzaliwa, kwa sasa jaribu kuitunza seheme vizuri: Weka kitovu kikavu, kiwache kipate upepo kusaidia kukauka. Ishushe pempas/kitambaa cha mtoto wako chini kwa mbele kuzuia kukifunika kitovu. Usiweke kitu chochote kwenye kitvou inaweza kuwa hatari kwa mtoto wako ikiwa utaingiza kitu chochote kwenye kitovu. Endelea kusafisha mtoto kwa kitambaa. Ikiwa hakuna madhara kitovu kikipata maji maji, kumkogesha mtoto kwa kitambaa kunaweza kusaidia kitovu kuwa kikavu. Kiache kitovu kianguke chenyewe. Jizuie kutamani kukivuta kitovu.
Matunzo ya mtoto Njiti -- Matunzo ya kitovu

Mshauri mama juu ya kudumisha usafi, ikiwemo kuosha mikoni mara kwa mara kwa sabuni na maji, mueleze kwamba kujikinga na maambukizi ni muhimu Zaidi kwa mtoto mtoto Njiti kuliko mtoto wa kawaida kwa sababu mtoto Njiti yupo kwenye hatari Zaidi ya maambukizi.

Matunzo ya ngozi kwa ngozi (KMC) ni njia ya matunzo kwa mtoto Njiti kwa ajili ya kumfanya mtoto aendelee kuwa na joto stahiki. Njia hii huhusisha mtoto kuchukuliwa kwa kutumia makutano ya ngozi kwa ngozi.
_Sisitiza kwamba mtu yoyote anaweza kufanya KMC._

Pitia hatua zifuatazo katika kumuweka mtoto kwa njia ya ngozi kwa ngozi na muangalie mama wakati anafanya KMC: Mvue nguo mtoto isipokuwa nepi, kofia na soksi. Muweke mtoto upright kati ya kifua cha mlezi pamoja na kifua cha mtoto. Weka miguu ya mtoto sambamba na mbavu za mama na kilekeze kichwa cha mtoto upande mmoja. Mfunike mtoto na nguo maalum itakayofungwa kumzunguka mama na mtoto. Sasa mama anaweza kuvaa shati, au sweta akitaka. _Mwambie mama amnyonyeshe mtoto mara kwa mara kadri ya mtoto anavyotaka kunyonya lakini angalau masaa 2._ Ni muhimu sana mtoto kupata makutano ya ngozi kwa ngozi kwa muda wa masaa 20 kila siku.

Je unajua kwa nini watoto njiti wanatakiwa kukaa sehem yenye joto la ziada kwa siku zao za mwanzo baada ya kuzaliwa? Watoto njiti wana mafuta kuliko watoto wakubwa, kwa hyo kuwa na joto lisilotosha linaweza kuwa ni tatizo. Hakikisha mtoto wako yuko mkavu na mwenye joto mda wote. Matunzo ya ngozi kwa ngozi (KMC) ni njia nzuri Zaidi kwa mamam kumfanya mtoto awe na joto stahiki mda wote. Muingiliano wa ngozi kwa ngozi unasaidia joto la mtoto kuwa la kawaida.

Matunzo ya ngozi kwa ngozi (KMC) ni njia ya matunzo kwa mtoto njiti ya kumfanya mtoto aendelee kuwa na joto stahiki. Njia hii huhusisha mtoto kuchukuliwa kwa kutumia makutano ya ngozi kwa ngozi.
Sisitiza kwamba mtu yoyote anaweza kufanya KMC.

Wewe na mwenzako/ mume wako au familia muna jukumu la kuhakikisha maendeleo ya akili ya mtoto na katika kipindi hiki cha miezi na miaka ya mwanzoni ni vyema kutumiwa vyema ili kuifanya akili yake ikuwe vizuri
Mtoto mchanga anaweza kuona vitu, kuvihisi, na anaweza kujibu sauti na milio huwa anasikia. Mtoto anaweza kutuambia kuwa anaona njaa au hana furaha kwa kwa sauti yake. Mtoto huwa anapenda kuona sura ya mama na baba yake (walezi wake wa karibu.)[ angalia tafsiri kwenye muongozo wa kazi]
Kadiri tunavyowapa nafasi watoto wetu kudadilisi wanayaona (kwa kucheza, kufanya mambo mapya, kuona vitu vipya na kuiga) ndio kadiri tunavyoweza kuwafanya wawe na akili.
Kwa mtoto wako unaweza:
[Siku 0-7]: Ongea na mwimbie mtoto. Mhamasishe aweze kuangalia, kusikiliza, kurusha miguu na mikono na kugusa vitu. Muoneshe tabasamu. Mshike mtoto wa upendo.

[Siku 8 hadi miezi 6]: MCHEZO: Toa njia za mtoto wako kuangalia, kusikiliza, kurusha mikono na miguu kwa uhuru, na kukugusa. Pole pole msogezee mtoto wako vitu vya rangi kwa ajili ya kuviangalia na kuvifuatilia. Mfano: Vitu vya kuchezea: kitairi kikubwa kwenye uzi, mwiko. WASILIANA: Tabasamu na cheka. Zungumza na mtoto wako. Hojiana kwa kuiga sauti ya mtoto wako au ishara.
